description: This file is a shell script (`.sh`) used to manage the download, verification, and uninstallation of applications based on a manifest, including sending notifications about download status and handling application-specific logic.

methods.name: checkAppDownload
methods.description: Verifies if the application data and manifest are present in the designated app directory.

methods.name: sendNotification
methods.description: Sends a notification event indicating the download status of the application.

methods.name: updatePkgStatus
methods.description: Updates the package status and broadcasts it.

methods.name: uninstallPackages
methods.description: Uninstalls packages that are not listed in the current manifest.
